verses.verse: When I would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, then the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>: for they <S%H6466>commit<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>; and the <S%H1590>thief<s%> cometh <S%H935>in<s%>, and the <S%H1416>troop<s%> of robbers <S%H6584>spoileth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>. wickedness: Heb. evils spoileth: Heb. strippeth

And they <S%H559>consider<s%> not in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> that I <S%H2142>remember<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: now their own <S%H4611>doings<s%> have beset them <S%H5437>about<s%>; they are before my <S%H6440>face<s%>. consider: Heb. say not to
They make the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> with their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> with their <S%H3585>lies<s%>.

They are all <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>, as an <S%H8574>oven<s%> <S%H1197>heated<s%> by the <S%H644>baker<s%>, who <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%> from <S%H5782>raising<s%> after he hath <S%H3888>kneaded<s%> the <S%H1217>dough<s%>, until it be <S%H2556>leavened<s%>. who: or, the raiser will cease raising: or, waking

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of our <S%H4428>king<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> have made him <S%H2470>sick<s%> with <S%H2534>bottles<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>; he stretched <S%H4900>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with <S%H3945>scorners<s%>. bottles: or, heat through wine

For they have made <S%H7126>ready<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven<s%>, whiles they lie in <S%H693>wait<s%>: their <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H3463>sleepeth<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>; in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>. made: or, applied

They are all <S%H2552>hot<s%> as an <S%H8574>oven<s%>, and have <S%H398>devoured<s%> their <S%H8199>judges<s%>; all their <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%>: there is none among them that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> unto me.
<S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, he hath <S%H1101>mixed<s%> himself among the <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is a <S%H5692>cake<s%> not <S%H2015>turned<s%>.

<S%H2114>Strangers<s%> have <S%H398>devoured<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%>, and he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it not: yea, gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> are here and <S%H2236>there<s%> upon him, yet he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not. here: Heb. sprinkled

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>testifieth<s%> to his <S%H6440>face<s%>: and they do not <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, nor <S%H1245>seek<s%> him for all this.
<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is like a <S%H6601>silly<s%> <S%H3123>dove<s%> without <S%H3820>heart<s%>: they <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, they <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

When they shall <S%H3212>go<s%>, I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> upon them; I will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> as the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> them, as their <S%H5712>congregation<s%> hath <S%H8088>heard<s%>.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> unto them! for they have <S%H5074>fled<s%> from me: <S%H7701>destruction<s%> unto them! because they have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: though I have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them, yet they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> against me. destruction: Heb. spoil

And they have not <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto me with their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, when they <S%H3213>howled<s%> upon their <S%H4904>beds<s%>: they <S%H1481>assemble<s%> themselves for <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and they <S%H5493>rebel<s%> against me.
Though I have <S%H3256>bound<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H2220>arms<s%>, yet do they <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> against me. have: or, chastened

They <S%H7725>return<s%>, but not to the most <S%H5920>High<s%>: they are like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>: their <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H2195>rage<s%> of their <S%H3956>tongue<s%>: <S%H2097>this<s%> shall be their <S%H3933>derision<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
